key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Evander Kane for high-sticking Carter Verhaeghe. Florida goes to the power play for 2 minutes with 19:23 remaining in the first period.
Sergei Bobrovsky has been solid for Florida, but the Oilers are finding ways to generate chances. How will Florida adjust their defensive strategy on this upcoming power play?
Sam Reinhart almost tied the game with a shot that hit the crossbar. He has been a key player for Florida this season.
for_commentary_agent.context: The momentum is moderate due to the missed shot and the penalty. A one-goal game and a power play opportunity for Florida warrants attention, but doesn't require play-by-play. Mixed coverage will allow for analysis of the penalty and its potential impact on the game.

game_context.game_situation: FLA leads by 1 in the first period

high_intensity_events.summary: Missed shot by S. Reinhart (away) hitting the crossbar
Penalty on E. Kane (home) for high-sticking C. Verhaeghe (away)

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Florida power play and potential scoring chances. Also, highlight the physical play that is developing.
